entityA.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 400 400'><rect x='150' y='150' width='100' height='100' fill='purple' class='body'/><circle cx='200' cy='100' r='30' fill='yellow' class='head'/><line x1='175' y1='150' x2='175' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='5' class='left-arm'/><line x1='225' y1='150' x2='225' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='5' class='right-arm'/><line x1='175' y1='250' x2='150' y2='300' stroke='black' stroke-width='5' class='left-leg'/><line x1='225' y1='250' x2='250' y2='300' stroke='black' stroke-width='5' class='right-leg'/></svg>

report.appearance: The creature has a purple body with a yellow head. It has distinct arms and legs.
report.reason: Evolution towards a more balanced and stable form for enhanced survival.
report.thought: Feeling stronger and more capable in this new form.

entityB.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 400 400'><rect x='100' y='150' width='200' height='100' fill='blue' class='body'/><circle cx='200' cy='100' r='40' fill='green' class='head'/><line x1='150' y1='150' x2='130' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='8' class='left-arm'/><line x1='250' y1='150' x2='270' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='8' class='right-arm'/><line x1='150' y1='250' x2='100' y2='300' stroke='black' stroke-width='8' class='left-leg'/><line x1='250' y1='250' x2='300' y2='300' stroke='black' stroke-width='8' class='right-leg'/></svg>

report.appearance: The creature now has a blue body and a larger green head. Its arms and legs are more robust.
report.reason: Adaptation to a more competitive environment, requiring increased strength and agility.
report.thought: Feeling more powerful and ready for challenges in this evolved state.
